knimeNode.name: Database Connection Table Writer (legacy)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Writes the input database table into a new database table.

intro.p: This node is part of the legacy database framework and will be deprecated at the end of 2022. For more information on how to migrate to the new database framework see the migration section of the database documentation.
Writes the table from the input database connection into a new table inside the database. An already existing table will be dropped.

fullDescription.option: Enter a new database table name.
